title: When will we get 3v3 Ranked Oceania?
body:
Alright fellas-
Just played in a 3v3 ranked competition and was very happy with how the game and map felt. I was wondering when abouts we may be given 3v3 ranked on Oceania. I think the community has grown since the initial opening of the server and I believe that it is only fair that Oceania gets the same recognition as other servers with 3v3 ranked.

replies.body: That would be so much fun!
you mean i can play 1v5 instead of 1v9? sign me up thats 4 less retards to worry about.
It is the game mode i play most with friends. But riot thinks pop is too small blah blah blah.

It would be very nice to have TT on all the time. I will say OCE has improved its numbers over the years and personally I hope it comes back and doesn't destroy other que timers with it (if riot could bring it back for a while just for a test)

Although I do think that they should hold off the ranked que for a while just for tests and other reasons that may effect the LoL game for some reason.(But yes after a while it would be nice for 3v3 ranked to come back)
3v3 Ranked Should be back RANKED asap!!! MOST FUN EVER With 3 Friends and thats all I have!
This actually sounds like a great idea, the whole reason I enjoyed playing was for the 3v3 back in NA servers but sounds great :) Nice post!

Appropriate bump. 
I'd play ranked Twisted Treeline so much if it was actually a thing. Being in Oceania I've never, since the launch of this server, had the opportunity to even queue up for ranked 3v3's. I think at the start of the season a while back they were accidentally enabled for a little while, and they were a blast.

This honestly just proves that other MOBAs are better; Smite for EG. I played aloooot of Smite in my time and they have plenty of different servers and every one of those servers have ranked games for; 1v1 2v2 3v3 4v4 5v5 and 6v6 (coming soon) so why can't we just have 1 good gamemode (ranked 3v3 TT).{{item:3070}}
I have always been keen for 3v3 ranked. I still don't see why they cant even put it up once a week for ranked. surely that wouldn't hurt the other queues too much?

We arent likely to get it because riot only cares about the NA server. we are just that cousin that never gets invited to go to cool parties so they give us some leftovers and cool photos to show what a good time they had without us
Please Riot PLEEEASE. This ranked mode would actually be better because it leaves less chance in the hands of your team mates cause I would make up a third of the team as opposed to only a fifth.
